Welcome to AngelBox!¶

  • AngelBox takes docker-compose “to the max” deployed on Fedora CoreOS.

  • Ready for RedHat OpenShift Container Platform to take over when scaling.

  • Production quality re-imagining of DevilBox

  • A framework for deploying compositions of docker images to production and staging servers.

  • A code-based learning hub for collating knowledge of practical container/docker usage
